item.title: Introducing the Dask Active Memory Manager
item.description:
Description

Speaker:: Guido Imperiale

Track: PyData: PyData & Scientific Libraries Stack The Active Memory Manager is a new experimental feature of Dask which aims to reduce the memory footprint of the cluster, prevent hard to debug out-of-memory issues, and make worker retirement more robust.

Recorded at the PyConDE & PyData Berlin 2022 conference, April 11-13 2022. https://2022.pycon.de More details at the conference page: https://2022.pycon.de/program/MZUDYP Twitter: https://twitter.com/pydataberlin Twitter: https://twitter.com/pyconde
